content.rendered:
Tempulli greatly supports and encourages staff training and development. This is done by organizing courses with different programs that deal with the daily work of the staff. The organization of working visits at home and abroad to partner institutions is done with the aim of further professional development of the school teaching staff. Visits abroad such as those at the University of Salzburg – Austria, Cork University College – Ireland and Politehnica University Bucharest, participation in international training by the IRU Academy in Zagreb in December 2011 have been very beneficial to the Tempulli.

Following the study visit of Tempulli students at the University of Durres in Albania (24.05.2010-26.05.2010) and at the University of Zagreb in Croatia (19 September 2016-25 September 2016), in this spirit the students mobility activities have been carried out.

Further agreements were also reached on student mobility and teaching staff. Such agreements have been reached with the Technical University of Berlin, Dresden and Freiburg in Germany, with the University of Zilina in Slovakia and with the Tallinn University of Technology in Estonia.

  • Student mobility from Tempulli at TU Dresden

Liridon Vranovci (academic year 2018/2019, winter semester;

(dates: 08.10.2018-03.02.2019)

  • Student mobility from TU Dresden at Tempulli

Christopher Beyer (date: 28.06.2018-16.09.2018)

Alexander Besrutschko (date: 09.12.2019-30.12.2019)

  • Mobility of teaching staff from Tempulli in TU Dreseden

Muhamed Krasniqi, Naim Çitaku, Fitim Shala, Gëzim Hoxha, Visar Baxhuku

  • Mobility of teaching staff from TU Dresden at Tempulli

Eric Schoene, Robert-Alexander Schëegler, Martin Sommer, Juliane Martin, Matthias Rohrbach

  • Mobility of teaching staff from Tempulli at TU Freiberg

Rrezarta Çitaku

  • Mobility of teaching staff from Tallinn University of Technology at Tempulli

     Anton Pashkevich (23.09.2019-13.10.2019)

COOPERATION WITH PUBLIC UNIVERSITIES FROM GERMANY AND SLOVAKIA
